3.0.0-beta.name: normalizr
3.0.0-beta.description: Normalizes JSON according to schema for Redux and Flux applications

scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdirp dist && npm-run-all --parallel build:development build:production

3.1.0.name: normalizr
3.1.0.description: Normalizes and denormalizes JSON according to schema for Redux and Flux applications

scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdirp dist && npm-run-all --parallel build:development build:production build:node
scripts.build:node: babel src/*.js -d dist && babel src/schemas/*.js -d dist

3.2.0.name: normalizr
3.2.0.description: Normalizes and denormalizes JSON according to schema for Redux and Flux applications

scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdirp dist && npm-run-all --parallel build:development build:production build:node
scripts.build:node: babel src/*.js -d dist && babel src/schemas/*.js -d dist

3.2.0.deprecated: Critical denormalize bug fix in 3.2.1, reverts incorrect recursive denormaliziation
